item.title: BMC Architecture
item.description: Table of Contents Baseboard Management Controller (BMC) Inter-Integrated Circuit (IÂ²C) System Management Bus (SMBus) Power Management Bus (PMBus) Platform Environment Control Interface (PECI) General Purpose Input Output (GPIO) Project Stage Baseboard Management Controller (BMC) Service processor which can monitoring the physical state of servers, computers or other hardware devices with help of sensors. The IPMI specifications define standardized, abstracted interfaces to the platform management subsystem.
